name.en: Product Design Methods and Practice I

goal.ch:
“**** 欲選修同學請先閱讀課程說明 ****
1. 課程說明 PDF (110學年度)
https://reurl.cc/W10XEy
https://drive.google.com/file/d/17wwtbm-rioeNlUDlgtoIhCu2CFZ8jyfp/view?usp=sharing
2. 影音說明 
修課同學需完整修完兩學期。
************************************
本學期為產品設計方法之前段課程，將著重在產品概念發展與設計規劃相關議題，包括從產品之相關問題探討與分析、產品策略發展、產品需求定義與產品功能發展等，以能找出符合設計要求的各種可行解決方案。後段課程將著重草圖設計（Embodiment Design）與其他重要的設計課題。本課程要求修習上下學期。“
goal.en: “The course in the semester will focus on the conceptual design, namely the important issues from formulation of the problems, development of the functions until to the principle solutions of a specified task.  Another part of design work -- embodiment design -- will be taught in the spring semester. All the participants of the course must take the courses in both fall semester and spring semester.“

outline.en:
“The course format consists of the lecture, exercise/case study, and design project.
[LECTURE]
1.??Fundamentals of Product Design??
LT01 The Nature of Design: Design in Product Development; Organization of Product Development; Products ＆ Design
LT02 Technology vs. Product Design: Life-Cycle of Products; Technology in the
Future; Problems in the Development of Technology
LT03 Design Methodology and Rational Design Processes: The Necessity of Design
Methods; Rational Design Process of Products
2. Analysis of Engineering Products
LT04 Problems and Functions in Product Design: What are problems? Bad Designs! Functions of Products
LT05 Human?Centered Product Design: Universal Design; Interaction Design
3. Product Planning and Marketing Strategies
LT06 Product Planning and Development: Marketing and PPD;??Marketing Strategies;
LT07 Customer Centered Product Strategies: Value of Products; Pricing Strategies
LT08 Methods for Finding Product Strategy :??Product?Market Matrix; PEST ＆ SWOT Analysis; BCG Matrix
4. Clarifying the Task
LT09 Identifying the Requirements for Product Concepts: Importance of identifying the requirements; How to Identifying the Requirements; Requirement List
5. Methodical Development of Principle Solution
LT10 Methods for Solution Finding: Fundamentals of Problem-Solving Methods; Design from Nature; Thinking and Acting Operations
LT11 Systematic Combination of Solutions : Fundamental of Morphological Chart; Generating Morphological Chart; Strategies for Convergence of Solutions
LT12 Function Structures for Product Concepts: Fundamentals of Function Structures; General Function Structures; Working with Function Structures
LT13 Abstraction and Realization: Graphic Representation ＆ Symbolization;??Abstraction ＆ Variation of Concepts; Variation of Mechanism
LT14 Designing Using Physical Effects: Fundamental of Physical Effects; Design Method using Physical Effects; Example: Stone Thrower
LT15 Designing Using Logical Functions: Boolean Algebra; Logical Function Structure; Example: Children Safety Lock in Automotive??
[DESIGN PROJECT]
Designing a scientific toy with a kinematic function!
[EXERCISE]
§ Freehand Sketch
§ Concept Representation
§ Graphical Thinking
§ Design Methods:
Brainstorming
Gallery Method
[CASE STUDY]
§ A New Design of Dispenser for Carrier Bags – Marketing ＆ Product Planning
§ Coin Checking Device -- Morphological Matrix
§ Corkscrew -- Functions of Product
§ Coffeemaker – Arrangement of Functions
§ Juicer -- General Function Structures
§ Child Safety Lock -- Logic Function Structures
§ Protection System against Pipe Break -- Specific Function Structures
§ Sugar Centrifuge -- Use-Value Analysis“
